resources.string: A global pandemic COVID-19 has hit several countries globally, seriously affecting their GDP and human life.
Since 2020 has been a wild year, Here\'s your chance to give the rest of the year your twist…
A global pandemic COVID-19 has hit several countries heavily damaging life and livelihood. \nYou come up with an ingenious cure…
Doggos be made to rule the world.
Administer essential oils mixed with garlic.
You\'d think the other option will be it worked. It never works, Karen.
They decide to break every possible ceramic in hooman\'s house.
They form a committee to find a real cure.
